Vermont Service Center
30 Houghton Street

St. Albans, VT 05478

Re: va = =—ti(‘C;~*~* Immigration Application

Dear Sir or Madam:

I am writing this letter on behalf of Ms. I and in

connection with her O-1 Visa Application.

My name is David Blaine and I am a magician, an illusionist and an
endurance artist. | am known for my high-profile feats of endurance, and
have made my name as a performer of street and close-up magic. | have
performed all over the world and have set and broken several world records,
including holding my breath for more than 17 minutes, spending 35 hours
atop a 105-foot pole and surviving a week buried in a coffin. | have traveled
internationally performing magic privately for President Bill Clinton and
Secretary of State Hillary Clinton, President George W. Bush, Secretary of
Defense Donald Rumsfeld at the Pentagon, Governor Arnold
Schwarzenegger, Henry Kissinger, Bill Gates and Mayor Michael Bloomberg.
I have also performed magic for the President of Russia Dmitry Medvedev,
the President of Georgia Mikheil Saakashvili, the President of Ukraine Victor
Yanukovych, and the President of Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev.

| net ES a few years ago through mutual friends
and | was highly impressed with her: I first met her as an amazing fashion
model, but, then, I discovered her intelligence, education, and her passion for
children and education. So, when I saw the other side of Svet, performing her
own brand of magic in fundraisers and other high end charitable events and
organizations, I realized what an amazingly talented public relations and
fundraising expert she is, and I was not surprised the least.

When it comes to organizing events, finding A-list funders for her
causes, in my opinion, [fis at the top of her game and is a true magician —
the success stories she pulled for the children on the US Virgin Islands, the
Ivory Coast, and many others are true miracles. She really makes a difference
in the lives of the world’s children.

It is not easy to raise money for education, especially technical/ STEM
education: People only reach into their pockets with the correct enticement.

HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_019086
